#### Complex Query 

The R program converts Tidyverse statements into their equivalent forms in SQL.

For the sake of Simplicity is better to use a relatively straightforward statement.

Any subsequent transformations can be carried out when the data is transferred to the our environment.

Relatively simple means just using a combination of select filter summarise and group by.


-----------------------

#### Compatible Object Classes

In addition to the classes.

Is important to note that SQL databases May support a greater variety of object types, compared to our and that or may not be able to support some object types. This will impede the ability of our to download. Certain object classes.

Other approaches may be required such as postgresql.

If an analysis requires these more complex object classes than probably DB plier entire diverse and not the correct tool kit.

And one should consider other approaches all together.
